headline: Goldman Sachs starts Life Sciences Tools coverage, rates these 3 stocks at Buy
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs has launched coverage of the Life Sciences Tools sector with a selective stance, arguing that the group should ultimately “return to their historic market growth rate of ~5%,” but only as certain end markets recover faster than others.

content.title: Goldman Sachs starts Life Sciences Tools coverage, rates these 3 stocks at Buy
